name: Remote Deployment Catapult
effect: As part of this action, you may deploy a Drone or Deployable that would normally require a quick action. If targeting a free, valid space, this deployment is made in that space. If targeting a character, this deployment is in any free, valid space adjacent to that character.

name: Vertigo Cascade
effect: This weapon’s Knockback may be in any direction, though it must be the same for all characters.
description: Targets briefly experience a localized gravity reorientation - they find that ‘down’ suddenly is in a completely different direction.

name: Mirrorswarm Nexus
effect: This weapon ignores ranged penalties from Engaged and can only attack targets within 2 spaces of the user or allied Mech characters.
description: A host of mirrored shards hover around the controller’s allies. The attacks that befall nearby foes take many forms, but are only visible in the reflections.

name: Recursion Weapon
effect: This weapon cannot be modified or benefit from core bonuses.
on_attack: On Miss: If the target has a Recursion Mark from this weapon, this attack instead hits.
on_hit: The target gains a Recursion Mark until the end of the scene or this weapon is used to attack a different target. Characters with this weapon’s Recursion Mark always count as within Threat and line of sight for this weapon, except for the purposes of reactions.
description: Time flows strangely around this weapon, with wielders often reporting sensations of déjà vu during combat.
